description: Here we introduce Protein-indexed Assay of Transposase Accessible Chromatin with sequencing (Pi-ATAC) that combines single-cell chromatin and proteomic profiling. In conjunction with DNA transposition, the levels of multiple cell surface or intracellular protein epitopes are recorded by index flow cytometry and positions in arrayed microwells, and then subject to molecular barcoding for subsequent pooled analysis. PiATAC simultaneously identifies the epigenomic and proteomic heterogeneity in individual cells. Pi-ATAC reveals a casual link between transcription factor abundance and DNA motif access, and deconvolute cell types and states in the tumor microenvironment in vivo. We identify a dominant role for hypoxia, marked by HIF1A protein, in the tumor microvenvironment for shaping the regulome in a subset of epithelial tumor cells.
before_start:
Prepare before:

2% PFA

 

1.25 M Glycin

 

single cell suspension solution: 200 U/ml Collagenase in HBSS-FBS (1%))

 

Nextera Kit: Illumina #15028212 (containing Tn5, 2X TD buffer)

 

Permeabilization buffer: 10 mM Tris ph7.5

                                       10 mM NaCl

                                         3 mM MgCl2

         add fresh 0.1% NP40 (NOTE: NP40 concentration/other detergents can vary from cell type to cell type)

 

reverse x-link Buffer: 50 mM Tris-HCl pH 8.0

                                  0.5% Tween20

                                  0.5% Igepal CA-630

                                  5 ng/ml proteinase K

 

0.5 M EDTA

 

2x NEBNext High Fidelity PCR MasterMix

 

Nextera adapters for scATAC (Buenrostro et al, Nature volume523, pages486–490 (23 July 2015))

materials.reagent_name: Nextera DNA library preparation kit 24 samples

warning: For safety warnings and hazard information, please refer to the SDS (Safety Data Sheet).

status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"f1bjm","text":"Remove PBS from dish, but keep on ice.\u00a0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
steps.section: Then make a single cell suspension

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"6t0v7","text":"Add single cell dissociation solution to dish (for most tissues: 200 U\/ml Collagenase in HBSS-FBS (1%)).\u00a0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1pgnf","text":"Try to pipet with 10 ml pipet, fill into 15ml tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7akcg","text":"Incubate 15 ml tube in 37\u00b0C incubator rotating (depending on amount and type of tissue).\u00a0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8e7f","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"53pre","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"1646","temperature":"37","unit":"10","label":"Incubation","guid":"5F6DD57E6795412192F8FB47E7D95627"}},{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"16477","duration":"900","label":"Incubation","guid":"C9A16A968A014780A3BE6DCEE0470165"}}]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cph5r","text":"Spin down for 5 min at 1000 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dvoc2","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"16478","duration":"300","label":"Spin down","guid":"11D5BEF71F934005B65699C13CAD8F36"}}]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"27ams","text":"Use a glass Pasteur pipet to mechanically disrupt remaining clogs, transfer single cells to a 75\u00b5m strainer into a new tube (50 ml or 15 ml).\u00a0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"15lg1","text":"Count cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3auql","text":"Aspirate supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c78rv","text":"Spin down desired amount of cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
